title: `iced-winit` pulls `wasm-bindgen-futures` when targeting non-wasm target
body:
### Is your issue REALLY a bug?

- [X] My issue is indeed a bug!
- [X] I am not crazy! I will not fill out this form just to ask a question or request a feature. Pinky promise.

### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues.

### Is this issue related to iced?

- [X] My hardware is compatible and my graphics drivers are up-to-date.

### What happened?

Hi, I am doing `cargo add --git https://github.com/iced-rs/iced iced --no-default-features` and not using/targeting `wasm` target but during `cargo tree`, I observed `iced_winit` pulls `wasm-bindgen*` dependencies.

```bash
    ├── iced_winit v0.13.0-dev (https://github.com/iced-rs/iced#faa5d0c5)
    │   ├── iced_futures v0.13.0-dev (https://github.com/iced-rs/iced#faa5d0c5) (*)
    │   ├── iced_graphics v0.13.0-dev (https://github.com/iced-rs/iced#faa5d0c5) (*)
    │   ├── iced_runtime v0.13.0-dev (https://github.com/iced-rs/iced#faa5d0c5) (*)
    │   ├── log v0.4.22
    │   ├── rustc-hash v2.0.0
    │   ├── thiserror v1.0.63 (*)
    │   ├── tracing v0.1.40
    │   │   ├── pin-project-lite v0.2.14
    │   │   ├── tracing-attributes v0.1.27 (proc-macro)
    │   │   │   ├── proc-macro2 v1.0.86 (*)
    │   │   │   ├── quote v1.0.36 (*)
    │   │   │   └── syn v2.0.72 (*)
    │   │   └── tracing-core v0.1.32
    │   │       └── once_cell v1.19.0
    │   ├── wasm-bindgen-futures v0.4.42
    │   │   ├── cfg-if v1.0.0
    │   │   ├── js-sys v0.3.69
    │   │   │   └── wasm-bindgen v0.2.92
    │   │   │       ├── cfg-if v1.0.0
    │   │   │       └── wasm-bindgen-macro v0.2.92 (proc-macro)
    │   │   │           ├── quote v1.0.36 (*)
    │   │   │           └── wasm-bindgen-macro-support v0.2.92
    │   │   │               ├── proc-macro2 v1.0.86 (*)
    │   │   │               ├── quote v1.0.36 (*)
    │   │   │               ├── syn v2.0.72 (*)
    │   │   │               ├── wasm-bindgen-backend v0.2.92
    │   │   │               │   ├── bumpalo v3.16.0
    │   │   │               │   ├── log v0.4.22
    │   │   │               │   ├── once_cell v1.19.0
    │   │   │               │   ├── proc-macro2 v1.0.86 (*)
    │   │   │               │   ├── quote v1.0.36 (*)
    │   │   │               │   ├── syn v2.0.72 (*)
    │   │   │               │   └── wasm-bindgen-shared v0.2.92
    │   │   │               └── wasm-bindgen-shared v0.2.92
    │   │   └── wasm-bindgen v0.2.92 (*)
```

### What is the expected behavior?

It must only pull wasm dependencies only when targeting wasm.

### Version

master

### Operating System

Windows

### Do you have any log output?

_No response_
